question: during Fajr salaah, I unintentionally burped while in sajda and some water came up. It only came up to the throat but did not reach the mouth
answer:
QUESTION
Assalamu'alaykum Mufti Saheb, this morning, during Fajr salaah, I unintentionally burped while in sajda and some water came up. It only came up to the throat but did not reach the mouth. As I was in sajda at the time, due to the small amount and the fact that it had not entered my mouth, I swallowed it again so as not to release it onto the masjid floor. Has my fast been invalidated and, if so, what do I need to rectify it? Jazaak Allah for your help.
ANSWER


Share:
Since it did not reach the mouth, your fast is not broken. (Tahtaawi pg.558)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Ml. Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
